Module com.example.schoolprojectjava1
Package com.example.schoolprojectjava1

Class Product

java.lang.Object
com.example.schoolprojectjava1.Product
public class Product extends Object
Represents a product in the inventory system.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description

    Creates a Product object with specified attributes and initializes its associated parts list.

  • Constructor Details

    • Product

      public Product(int id, String name, double price, int inventoryLevel, int min, int max)
      Creates a Product object with specified attributes and initializes its associated parts list.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the product.
      name - The name of the product.
      price - The price of the product.
      inventoryLevel - The current inventory level of the product.
      min - The minimum allowed inventory level for the product.
      max - The maximum allowed inventory level for the product.

      public boolean deleteAssociatedPart(Part selectedAssociatedPart)
      Removes an associated part from the product.
      Parameters:
